Uses of Interface
org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.EvictionPolicy

  • Packages that use EvictionPolicy 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction
    Contains cache eviction policy implementations.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.fifo
    Contains cache FIFO eviction policy implementations.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs
    Contains IGFS LRU eviction policy implementations.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.lru
    Contains cache LRU eviction policy implementations.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.sorted
    Contains cache sorted eviction policy implementation.
    org.apache.ignite.configuration
    Contains configuration-related classes.

    • Uses of EvictionPolicy in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction that implement EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractEvictionPolicy<K,V>
      Common functionality implementation for eviction policies with max size/max memory and batch eviction support.

    • Uses of EvictionPolicy in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.fifo

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.fifo that implement EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FifoEvictionPolicy<K,V>
      Eviction policy based on First In First Out (FIFO) algorithm and supports batch eviction.

    • Uses of EvictionPolicy in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.igfs that implement EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IgfsPerBlockLruEvictionPolicy
      IGFS eviction policy which evicts particular blocks.

    • Uses of EvictionPolicy in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.lru

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.lru that implement EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LruEvictionPolicy<K,V>
      Eviction policy based on Least Recently Used (LRU) algorithm and supports batch eviction.

    • Uses of EvictionPolicy in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.sorted

      Classes in org.apache.ignite.cache.eviction.sorted that implement EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SortedEvictionPolicy<K,V>
      Cache eviction policy which will select the minimum cache entry for eviction.

    • Uses of EvictionPolicy in org.apache.ignite.configuration

      Methods in org.apache.ignite.configuration that return EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvictionPolicy<K,V> CacheConfiguration.getEvictionPolicy()
      Deprecated. 
      Use CacheConfiguration.getEvictionPolicyFactory() instead.
      EvictionPolicy<K,V> NearCacheConfiguration.getNearEvictionPolicy()
      Deprecated. 
      Use NearCacheConfiguration.getNearEvictionPolicyFactory() instead.
      Methods in org.apache.ignite.configuration that return types with arguments of type EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.cache.configuration.Factory<EvictionPolicy<? super K,? super V>> CacheConfiguration.getEvictionPolicyFactory()
      Gets cache eviction policy factory.
      javax.cache.configuration.Factory<EvictionPolicy<? super K,? super V>> NearCacheConfiguration.getNearEvictionPolicyFactory()
      Gets cache eviction policy factory.
      Methods in org.apache.ignite.configuration with parameters of type EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CacheConfiguration<K,V> CacheConfiguration.setEvictionPolicy(EvictionPolicy evictPlc)
      Deprecated. 
      Use CacheConfiguration.setEvictionPolicyFactory(Factory) instead.
      NearCacheConfiguration<K,V> NearCacheConfiguration.setNearEvictionPolicy(EvictionPolicy<K,V> nearEvictPlc)
      Deprecated. 
      Use NearCacheConfiguration.setNearEvictionPolicyFactory(Factory) instead.
      Method parameters in org.apache.ignite.configuration with type arguments of type EvictionPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets cache eviction policy factory.
      NearCacheConfiguration<K,V> NearCacheConfiguration.setNearEvictionPolicyFactory(javax.cache.configuration.Factory<? extends EvictionPolicy<? super K,? super V>> nearEvictPlcFactory)
      Sets cache eviction policy factory.
